reviews.text: They are located within the East Market. The staffs are super nice. They have a limited table top seating at their stand. But there are plenty of seating...

Tiny, and I had to walk all the way around the market to find them.  Look for the sign and a few stools, beside Winston's I think.

Small menu, and I wanted...
This is such a fun and casual spot to grab food. This is my first time at the East Market and trying out Koso. I loved the kimbap and their kimchi...
